thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: James
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by James

author: James
title: James
text:
AAG stepped in when I was having many postponement and other delays from a local reverse mortgage company. They picked up the ball and moved things along well. However, like the previous company, governmental and banking "details" slowed things down, again.
It would be great to think that simply taking some of the equity I have put in my own home and using it, rather than waiting to die or down-size, would be a simpler process.
So much time was wasted with nit-picking forms and regulations I nearly decided to forget the whole thing. Not AAG's fault...just the System.
